video_prompt: Subtle shifts in expression, eyes slowly scanning, then pupils dilate. Gentle parting of lips, reflecting light. Hair strands subtly move across the forehead and cheeks, responding to imperceptible breezes. Delicate jewelry sways.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Close-up digital painting of a serene woman's face, soft features, porcelain skin, gentle cool light. Dark hair swept to the side with intricate silver ornaments. Captivating silvery-grey eyes with wispy lashes and white eyeliner. Full, slightly parted shimmery pinkish-red lips. Soft reddish blush, defined dark eyebrows. Elegant droplet earrings. Ethereal, tranquil, otherworldly beauty. Signed "e C 29".
refined_video_prompt: Subtle shifts animate the expression. Eyes slowly scan, pupils distinctly dilate. Lips gently part. Hair strands delicately drift across the forehead and cheeks, stirred by imperceptible breezes. Delicate jewelry sways with minimal motion.
